meanings.definition: The quality or state of being hellish.
meanings.sent1: The hellishness of the haunted house scared me.
meanings.sent2: The soldiers endured the hellishness of war.
meanings.sent3: The movie exaggerated the hellishness of the villain's lair for dramatic effect.
meanings.sent4: The heatwave brought a hellishness to the city streets.
meanings.sent5: The artist's painting captured the true hellishness of the inferno.

meanings.sent1: The students complained about the hellishness of the final exam.
meanings.sent2: The hikers faced the hellishness of climbing the steep mountain.
meanings.sent3: The long line at the grocery store added a touch of hellishness to my day.
meanings.sent4: The traffic jam created a sense of hellishness on the highway.
meanings.sent5: The endless paperwork brought a wave of hellishness to the office.
